title: The Girl
description: The truth is I hate him. I hate his warm brown eyes with flecks of gold, his chiseled face, broad shoulders and massive wings.I hate how over protective he is just because a few thousand demons are after me.In fact, I couldn't care less about Marcus or his perfect telekinetic girlfriend.And when I see him holding her, I don’t die a little inside…
author: Lola St. Vil
